isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - BAROMETRIC PRESSURE (BARO) SENSOR - BAROMETRIC PRESSURE SENSOR (BARO) OPERATION

svcproc.title: BAROMETRIC PRESSURE SENSOR (BARO) OPERATION
svcproc.para: The ECM sends a regulated 5 volt signal from ECM connector (379) terminal 26 to BARO connector (406) terminal 2. The BARO sensor returns a variable voltage signal (represents atmospheric pressure) from BARO connector (406) terminal 3 to the ECM at terminal 5. The BARO sensor is grounded from connector (406) terminal 1 to the ECM signal ground terminal 46.
